info.name: Normalize the Add-on Bar - Fx 4+
info.description:
For Firefox 4+ and latest Firefox Beta, Aurora, and Nightly builds.

This style provides more space for the Old Status Bar Icons and Toolbar Buttons Icons on the Add-on Bar by decreasing their icon spacing and by hiding useless toolbar button drop-markers and the hover background effects of toolbar buttons and the Add-on Bar Close Button.

Works well with Userstyles:

style 37319

style 43235

Tested on Firefox 4+ and up to the latest Firefox Beta, Aurora, Nightly builds.

Modified code from Userstyles:

style 37460

style 40960

style 60116

style 60114

style 53823

To customize or fix Firefox Beta, Aurora, and Nightly builds, you can also have a look at my other styles: user 61655
info.additionalInfo: ***!important*** Note: To users if you have a toolbar-button placed on the Add-on Bar that increases it height, please inform me of the Add-on that it's for. Updated 03-31-2012 Fixed the issue wth the Add-on bar's height and included the updated code for Fx 14.0a1 from style: style 60114 Updated 03-29-2012 Did some code cleanup and added support for [Ext]Plugins Toggler and added style code: style 53823 Updated 02-24-2012 Due to Bug 693510 - drop support for prefixes from border-radius* and box-shadow Updated 01-30-2012 Restored [Ext]Firefm old status-bar icon buttons borders. Updated 01-18-2012 Reduced the Add-on bar's height and removed style style 15061 code, now only redundant toolbar button drop-markers are hidden by default. Also, added style compatibility for style style 43235. Updated 11-17-2011 Fixed a problem with the Add-on bar's top border when using Personas Themes. Updated 12-30-2010 Now compatible with [Ext]Firefox 4 UI Fixer: https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/258712/ and [Ext]Barlesque: https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/259879/
